summary: High definition, high quality 100% handmade textures for Skyrim weapons. Updated on 19. February with Steel Waraxe! All steel weapons done now :3
descriptionHtml:
This is a project aimed to have a high-resolution texture for every single weapon in Skyrim. Everything is made from scratch by yours truly. Unfortunately on break atm due to work, New Vegas and other projects.

[url=http://www.newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=38285]I have a similar project for Fallout: New Vegas, too, check it out![/url]

To install: Unarchive in your Skyrim/Data folder.

[size=3]Changelog[/size]

[b]19.2.2012[/b] - Steel Waraxe
[b]22.12.2011[/b] - Steel Mace
[b]13.12.2011[/b] - Steel Dagger
[b]12.12.2011[/b] - Steel Warhammer
[b]9.12.2011[/b] - Steel Greatsword
[b]6.12.2011[/b] - Steel Sword
[b]3.12.2011[/b] - Mehrunes' Razor
[b]30.11.2011[/b] - Iron Sword
[b]28.11.2011[/b] - Iron Dagger
[b]27.11.2011 - Initial Release[/b] - Iron Battleaxe
author: Millenia
